note: Keith. Lifelong Floridian. Famebot level: 0 An odd combination of middle-aged white guy, moderate progressive, believer, geek, fisherman, helper, environmentalist, father, husband, leader, author, speaker, culture geek, and other things I can't think of right now. - Born in the 60's - Grew up in the 70's - Educated in the 80's - Matured in the 90's - Wed and parented in the 00's - Awareness in the '10s - Fighting for fact-based truth, freedom, and justice in the '20s What's next?

fields.name: Father of One
fields.value: One daughter, college aged, studying marine science. Quite proud

fields.name: Husband of One
fields.value: Married 2000, she challenges and comforts me. Quite proud

fields.name: Believer
fields.value: Follower of Jesus. No, not one of those, please don't assume I'm like them. Questions? Please ask
